channel.title: Webinars on SASIP
channel.description: Recent content in Webinars on SASIP

item.title: June 30th, 2021 - SASIP Webinar #2
item.description: The second SASIP Webinar will be held remotely on June 30th, 2021 starting at 10am CEST. The presentation entitled Observing and Modelling the Marginal Ice Zone will be made by Christopher Horvat. The recording of the presentation is available here : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z8YAugYNNKU and the presentation’s slides are available here : https://www.dropbox.com/s/8dnypn9byzdfn2g/SASIP-MIZ.pptx?dl=0
